mapinfo.detailsText:
Located in southern patagonia, this region is home to the Mapuche. You are seperated from the opposing team by an impassable cliff surrounded by a narrow river. While there are few fish, this river may prove useful for transport or for adding naval firepower to defensive tactics. A few llamas may be found wandering in the south alongside a small trade route. The trade route is not available in FFA games. 
 
 Outlaws: Pistolero / Comanchero 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk 
 


 Map by dansil92
